div.style: caret-color: rgb(40, 40, 40); color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: latoregular; font-size: 16px;

p.span:
DISTANCE LEARNING:
With guidance from local medical and health department experts, it was in the best interest of our students and staff to move to a Distance Le

span.span: arning Curriculum for Gretna Public Schools beginning Monday, March 23rd through the remainder of the school year.
Resources for both parents and students have been posted under the COVID-19 tab on all school web pages.

div.style: font-size: medium; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: -webkit-standard; text-size-adjust: auto;

br.div: We wanted to share this 5-minute video (link below) by Mike Smith, who spoke at the high school this fall, discussing the opportunities this time of uncertainty and challenge offers all students, families and community at large. Even in this unprecedented time, there are countless opportunities to live out the district’s #Be Kind initiative.

div.style: font-size: medium; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: -webkit-standard; text-size-adjust: auto;
font-size: medium; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: -webkit-standard; text-size-adjust: auto;
font-size: medium; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: -webkit-standard; text-size-adjust: auto;

span.style: caret-color: rgb(40, 40, 40); letter-spacing: 0.15pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(32, 33, 36);
span.span: Meals for families of Gretna Public Schools

br.span: In an effort to help support families in our community during this time of distance learning we will be offering meals for students in need at no cost. Please go to this link if we can support you

a.style: color: rgb(149, 79, 114); text-decoration-line: none; background-color: transparent; caret-color: rgb(40, 40, 40); text-size-adjust: auto; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.span: If you or someone you know is interested in donating to the HOT LUNCH program to assist with meals during the temporary Closing of Gretna Public Schools,
